activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The `SplashActivity` serves as the initial screen that determines the next activity to launch based on the presence of a specific intent extra (`OPEN_NOTE_ID`). It either opens `MainActivity` with an associated note ID or without any additional data.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_property.effect: contains the main UI components of the activity

activities.summary: The MainActivity of the com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro application is the central hub for managing notes. It allows users to create, edit, view, and delete notes, as well as perform various operations like searching, exporting, and printing notes. The activity utilizes a ViewPager to manage multiple notes and provides a toolbar with options for various actions such as saving, searching, and settings.

static_properties.text: Thank you for using Simple Notes.\nFor more simple apps please visit SimpleMobileTools.com.
Place cursor to the end of note
